short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Superhero Wallet is a multi-blockchain wallet to manage crypto assets and navigate the web3 and DeFi space.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Superhero Wallet is the multi-blockchain wallet to manage crypto assets and navigate web3 and DeFi Space.

Currently supporting Bitcoin, Ethereum and æternity blockchains.

Superhero Wallet offers:

- enhanced security based on seed phrase encryption
- secure cold signing via AirGap
- Wallet Connect readiness
- dapps integrations
- address book functionality
- multisig transactions to manage crypto assets by multiple accounts (where applicable)
- a bunch of cool features and constantly improving UX driven by a vibrant community.

Superhero Wallet connects also users to the Superhero community with the dedicated Superhero Wallet extension. Send and receive tips, store or withdraw aeternity tokens, participate in community voting to have your voice heard.

Superhero gives you the power to transact digital assets anybody anywhere — without third party interference, fees, or commissions.

Latest Release 2.3.2 
Features/Enhancements
Revamp dapp connection UI when accessing wallet
dapp Connection UI - Inform the user if origin is unknown
Display Permission Management as Modal
Transactions Recipients Improved Address Selector (select addresses from own/recent transactions)

Fixes
Recreate Etherscan API Keys for Ethereum Middleware connection
Fix Display of token information regarding Price Value (in coins and fiat), market cap, volume and more.
Fix display of sell assets
Fix display of decoded callData for ethereum transactions
Import correctly private key account on mobile application
Display correct token address for token sale transactions
